text:
Kurt Malangré (18 September 1934 – 4 October 2018) was a German politician. He was born in Aachen.
In 1972 he was elected Mayor of Aachen, and from 1973–1989 he was Lord Mayor. From 1979 to 1999 he was also Member of the European Parliament.
Malangré died on October 4, 2018 in Aachen from lung cancer at the age of 84.
